#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		long n,i,temp,k=1,l=0;
		long ar[100002];
		cin>>n;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			scanf("%ld",&ar[i]);
		}
		sort(ar,ar+n);
		for(i=0;i<n-1;i++)
		{
			if(ar[i]==ar[i+1]) { k++; if(k>l) l=k; }
			else { k=1;  } 
			//cout<<k<<",";
		}
		if(k==1 && l==0) cout<<"1"<<endl; else cout<<l<<endl;
	}
}
